title: My runes are bugged pre game, I cant change them or know what im picking anymore(new client)
body:
I have 2 rune pages and one of them is fully blank and wont let me add runes into it. That rune page is named "yea".

When I am in pre game lobby both of my rune pages turn into "yea" and i cant tell if im going to load in with my full attack speed setup or no runes. 

Im scared to change my other rune page that isnt empty for this same reason. 


I tried reinstalling LoL. 

I tried to put runes in but it wont let me save it.

I don't know how to use the old client. 

I dont know what to do. 

This is the reason ive barely touched LoL this past week.

replies.body: We've seen a few reports on this, and want to investigate further.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll take a look!  To help us out a bit, rename your impacted rune pages so we know which ones, and let the specialist know what you named them.  We'll get back to you as soon we can!

I have absolutely the same problem as you described. Just as you, I tried literally everything including reinstalling my lol client. Nothing works, except of switching to the legacy client. Feels bad...
You can launch the old client from your login page (this one where you enter password).

Since we are not the only ones with this runes bug, I hope these cucks at Riot are aware of the issue and working on fixing it.
